logo.fieldLabel: Do you need logo for the site

utilitynav.name: ./listFromNav

linkURL.fieldDescription: Enter the URL for the link. Use a full URL for external links (e.g., 'https://www.example.com'), a relative path for internal links (e.g., '/content/page'), or an anchor name prefixed with '#' for in-page navigation (e.g., '#section1'). Ensure the correct format is used for the link to function properly.
linkURL.name: ./linkURL

analytics.emptyText: Please configure the data title for Analytics.

analytics.name: ./dataTitle

megaMenuLinkURL.fieldDescription: Enter the URL for the link. Use a full URL for external links (e.g., 'https://www.example.com'), a relative path for internal links (e.g., '/content/page'), or an anchor name prefixed with '#' for in-page navigation (e.g., '#section1'). Ensure the correct format is used for the link to function properly.
megaMenuLinkURL.name: ./megaMenuLinkURL
